trends: There have been no other sightings in Streator
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: aeriel amazement 4th time in my life
divs: sighting detailsdropped my wife off at bowling alley far north end of town drove toward end of lot by farm field and looked as always into the sky out there because of no obstructions and its darkness and noticed a yellowish object under the clouds we had high overcast with stars earlier didn't think much of it went home took my dog out and the object was still out there after taking dog in sat down for an hour then left to pickup my wife looked in sky and still in same spot went back in to get my binoculars to get a better look seem to distant but all through this its color stayed a white\yellow color not moving as a star or planet drove to bowling alley and watched as object started to pulse(blinking)then it moved all of a sudden due north for approx. 5 seconds then a 90 degree turn to due east and sped at a super fast speed across the sky until it disappeared from sight in just a few seconds this event started when seen at about6pm and lasted to 8:25pm
